text:
@RudyGiuliani This certainly requires some form of investigation. Am I the only who thinks the current POTUS is injecting some terrible stuff into those around him, which affects their personalities? How else does one explain views by the likes of @RudyGiuliani?

#coronavirus #thursdayvibes
